tool_description: Unofficial NBA API for Historical NBA Data
name: Free NBA
title: Free NBA

api_list.name: Get a Specific Team
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific team

api_list.name: Get All Games
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all games.  Seasons are represented by the year they began. For example, 2018 represents season 2018-2019.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number, used for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of results returned per call, used for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: An array of dates formatted in 'YYYY-MM-DD'

api_list.name: Get a Specific Game
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific game

api_list.name: Get All Stats

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number, used for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of results returned per call, used for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: dates
optional_parameters.description: An array of dates formatted in 'YYYY-MM-DD'

api_list.name: Get All Players
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all players from all seasons.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number, used for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of results returned per call, used for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Used to filter players based on their name. For example, ?search=davis will return players that have 'davis' in their first or last name.

api_list.name: Get Specific Player
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific player.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the player to retrieve

api_list.name: Get All Teams
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all teams for the current season.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number, used for pagination.
